title: Sad Eyes
lyrics:
9 ContributorsSad Eyes Lyrics[Verse 1]
Looks like it's over
You knew I couldn't stay
She's coming home today
We had a good thing
I'll miss your sweet love
Why must you look at me that way
It's over

[Chorus]
Sad eyes, turn the other way
I don't want to see you cry
Sad eyes, you knew there'd come a day
When we would have to say goodbye

[Verse 2]
Try to remember
The magic that we shared
In time your broken heart will mend
I never used you
You knew I really cared
I hate to see it
Have to end
But it's over

[Chorus]
Sad eyes, turn the other way
I don't want to see you cry
Sad eyes, you knew there'd come a day
When we would have to say goodbye
You might also like[Chorus]
Sad eyes, turn the other way
I don't want to see you cry
Sad eyes, you knew there'd come a day
When we would have to say goodbye

[Chorus]
Sad eyes, turn the other way
I don't want to see you cry (cry, cry, cry)
Sad eyes, you knew there'd come a day
When we would have to say goodbye

[Outro]
Sad eyes, turn the other wayEmbed
